homepage.title: SteamWGP | Home
homepage.description: Join SteamWGP to discover the best games you can enjoy with friends. Create or join a Steamder and embark on unforgettable gaming sessions!

login.title: SteamWGP | Login
login.description: Log in to access your game library and enter exclusive Steamders.

library.title: SteamWGP | My Library
library.description: Manage your game library on SteamWGP, explore new ways to play, and initiate Steamders with your favorite games.

steamder.title: SteamWGP | Steamder
steamder.description: Join a Steamder room where players come together to decide on the game for the evening. Swipe, vote, and the first game to win everyone's approval will be chosen to play together.

steamders.title: SteamWGP | All Steamders
steamders.description: Browse and join active Steamders, meet new players, and partake in thrilling group adventures.

cgu.title: SteamWGP | Terms of Use
cgu.description: Learn about our terms of use to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience on SteamWGP.

legals.title: SteamWGP | Legal Mentions
legals.description: Learn everything about the rules and regulations that govern the use of the SteamWGP platform.

404.title: SteamWGP | Error 404
404.description: Oops! The page you are looking for is not available. It may have been moved or deleted.
